function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emergence of drug-resistant M. tuberculosis strains","Impact":"Increased difficulty in treating tuberculosis and higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict infection control measures and development of new treatment options","Technologies":"UV lights, negative air ionization","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, individuals in resource-limited settings","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","Impact":"High transmission rates and increased public health burden","Mitigation":"Development of new treatment options, implementation of infection control measures, and public health education","Technologies":"UV lights, negative air ionization","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased transmission in healthcare settings and resource-limited settings","Impact":"Higher risk of infection for patients, healthcare workers, and individuals in resource-limited settings","Mitigation":"Implementation of infection control measures and use of technologies such as UV lights and negative air ionization","Technologies":"UV lights, negative air ionization","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, individuals in resource-limited settings","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations"}]}
